message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product for $10,000. I believe it holds significant value and would be a great asset to you.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I understand the value of the product, but my budget allows me to pay no more than $8,000. Would you consider accepting this price?
Bob, I appreciate your offer, but $10,000 is my bottom line. I'm confident this product will be a worthwhile investment for you, even at that price.
